333a6(mdo): gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs byini pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ba'o// ba mtho/ 
333a7(mdo): 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag/ bya chub sems da pal rnams kyi sa dam tho yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga ga zhe
333a8(mdo): na 'di lta ste// bdag ni byi rtas pa mo mang rtog pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang kyi rtag pa sa ma rtog pa sa nas s+ho sa zugs 'byidang parmed par 'gyur ste/ des kyi rtag par po ma rtog pa 'i 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / 
333b1(mdo): gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs myed pa'i 'dod chags las yang dag par 'da' ba gang yin pa'o// bdag ni bdag myed par so sor rtog pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang bdag myed par so sor rtog pa la 'god do zhes dbugs la
333b2(mdo): 'byind pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la bdag myed par so so ma rtog pa ni/ chos thams cad la mngon par zhend pa myed pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni bden pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang bden pa la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byind pa rnyed
333b3(mdo): de la bden pa ni lha dang myi la slu pa myed pa nyid ka yin pa 'o// bdag ni yang dag pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang yang dag pa la 'god de zhes dbugs 'byin pa yi rnyed par 'gyur te/ rnye la yang dag pa ni lha rnams dpa bdag la sru brgyang
333b4(mdo): pa nyid gang yin pa'o// bdag ni chos spyod pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan de dag kyang chos spyod pa la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byind pa rnyed par 'gyu/ ra te/ de la chos spyod pa ni chos la rton pa nyid gang yin pa'o// 'jam
333b5(mdo): dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa 'a rnams kyi sa dang zo yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpa gzhan yang dbugs 'byon pa rnyed pa lnga ngas/ byang chub sems dpal/ 
333b6(mdo): rnams kyi sa dang tho yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag ni tshul khrims lhod pa myed pa nyid la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang rgyal khrims lhod pa myed pa nyid la 'god do zhes 'bubs 'byinang pa rnyeb par 'gyur
333b7(mdo): te/ de la tshul khrims lhod pa byed pa nyid ni/ khan ma tho ba ji tsam du chu rgya yang myi byed pa nyid do// bdag ni tshul khrims ma ral ba nyid la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang rgyas sgrims ma ngas pa nyid la 'god de zhes dbugs pa
333b8(mdo): 'byinang pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la tshul khrims ma ral pa nyid ni theg pa gzhan du spro 'dogos pa myed pa gang yin pa'o/ bdag ni rgyal khrims skyon myed pa nyid la gnas kyis gzhin dag kyang tshul khrims skyon byed pa nyid
334a1(mdo): la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byind pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la tshul khrims skyon myed pa nyid ni/ nyes pa thams cad rnam par song ba gang yin pa'o// bdag ni thun tshags ma yin pa'i tshuyi khrims nyid la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang
334a2(mdo): thun tshags ma yin pa'i tshul khrims nyid la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byind pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la tshul khrims thun tshags ma yin pa nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su 'dzind pa gang yin pa'o// / bdag ni legs par

334a7(mdo): bar grags pa'i tshul khrims la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byind pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la rnam par grags pa'i tshul khrims nyid ni/ chos kyi dbyings dbyer myed pa'i chos thams cad la gnyis su myed pa'i ye shes 'jug pa gang yin pa'o/ 
334a8(mdo): bdag ni cho ga shes pa'i tshul khrims la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chog shes pa'i tshul khrims la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byind pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de lta rdzog shes pa'i tshul khrims nyid ni chags pa 'phangs pa gdu yin pa'o// 
334b1(mdo): 'i tshus zhims nyid pa gnas kyis/ gzhan sa kyang dgo can gnas pa'i rgyas zhigs nyid pa 'god de zhes dbugs 'byid pa rnyed pas gyur te/ 'dag ni dag pan gnas pa'i rgyal khrims nyid / ma sems cad la ma'a' dpa
334b2(mdo): dbu pa myed par 'jug pa gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byind pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang blo yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa larnyed pa lnga dang
334b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang ma yongs su sbyor bar 'gyur te/ ldag bzhes 'di lta ste/ bdag ni bzod pa'i tshul khrims nyid la gnas kyis gzhin dag kyang bzod pa'i tshul khrims nyid la 'ged ngo zhes dbugs 'byir

335a1(mdo): ba la ngoms pa myed par dgod pa gang yin pa'o// ba gi na mu tshor gyi smra ba'i tshul khrims nyid la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang mu tshor gyi sma nga'i tshul khrims nyid la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byind pa rnyed par 'gyur te/

335a7(mdo): 'byind pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la dul ba'i tshul khrims nyid ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su sbyinang par byed pa dang / sems can thams nad kyis ngan du brjod pa dang / ngang du smras pa'i tshig gi lam mthong pa gang yin par
335a8(mdo): bdag ni ngas pa 'cho ma yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims nyid la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang rim pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshul zhims nyid la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byind brnyed par 'gyur te/ de la dam pa'i chos
335b1(mdo): sa su 'dzind pa'i tshul khrims nyid ni stong pa nyid la mos pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi tshul khrims nyid la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzind kyi tshul khrims la 'god do zhes

335b6(mdo): thams cad yongs su smyind par bya ba'i phyir/ sdug bsngal gi yo byad gang myi le nad pa de ci yang myed pa dang / bdel ba'i yo byad gang myi gtong ba de ci yang myed pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni dga' ba la gnas kyis// gzhan
335b7(mdo): ngag kyang dga' ba la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byind pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la dga' ba ni stong pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid la dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po gang yin pa'o// bdag ni btang snyoms

337a8(mdo): dbang po la gnas kyis gzhan das kya dang pa'i dbang po sa da de zhes 'azhugs 'byinang parnyed par 'gyur te/ de sa dang pa da ma ni mamamasasams gnadag N+Di gyi 'jig gcigs pa nyid gan yin pam// bdag ni bzod
337b1(mdo): 'grus kyi dbang po la gnas kyis/ gzhan yang brtson 'grus kyi dbang po 'god do zhes dbugs 'byinang par 'gyur ba te/ de la brtson gyi dbang po ni chos thams cad la legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa nyid gang yin pa chod// bdag ni rnam

337b6(mdo): be ni chos thams cad la mngon sum du shes pa nyid gang yin pa che bdag ni dad pa'i stobs la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang dad pa'i stobs la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byind pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la dad pa'i stobs ni
337b7(mdo): bdud kyi las yang dag par 'da' ba gang yin pa'o// bdag ni ye shes kyi stobs la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang ye shes kyi stobs la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byind pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la ye shes kyi stobs ni myi shes pa rnam par
337b8(mdo): 'joms pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni brtsom 'grus kyi stobs la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang brtson 'grus kyi stobs la 'god do zhes dbug sa'i byi nang pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni phyir myi ldog pa'i
338a1(mdo): chos sgrub pa nyid kang yin pa'o// bdag ni dran pa'i stobs la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang dran pa'i stobs la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byind par 'gyur te/ de la dran pa'i stobs ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dzin pa nyid gapa'
338a2(mdo): yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byind pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byind pa rnyed pa lnga dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
338a3(mdo): dang po yongs su sbyor bar 'gyur ba ste/ lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag ni tiping 'dzind kyi stobs la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang ting nge 'dzind kyi stobs la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byind pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la ting nge 'dzind kyi stobs ni
338a4(mdo): rtog pa dang dpyod pa thams cad spong ba gang yin pa'o// bdag ni shes rab kyi stobs la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang shes rab kyi stobs la 'a god do zhes dbugs 'byind par rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la shes rab kyi stobs
338a5(mdo): ni myi rdzi ba'i shes pa nyid gang yin pa'o// bdag ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag la 'god de zhes/ dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/ de la dran pa

348b7(mdo): leshe pa de nyid kyis ye she pa de nyid btsal bar myi bya'o// bdag ni de bzhin gshesas pa rtan mas pa ma sbyin/ de bzhin gyi shegs pa myi rtag pa yong pa yin no zhes bya 'o 'o phyogs kyis/ gzhan dag kyang de ba'i na n+ta she sa
348b8(mdo): rtag pa yang ma yin/ byi rtag pa bzhin gshes pa myi rtag pa yang ma yin no zhes sa ba ga gzung po zhe hU~M/ dbug 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la de bzhin pag gas pa rtag pa yang ma yin/ myi rtag
348b9(mdo): zhes bya ba ni/ rlom sems kyi bye bo nyid myed pa'i phyir ro// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsam kis kyi khyab po la zhes bya ba'i ye shes 'di la zhugs kyis/ gzhan dag kyang / de swA ni ni gshegs/ yA ba ga gis myi khyam pa
349a1(mdo): gzugs ni mtshan nyid byed pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/ gzugs kyi rang bzhir las mtsham nyid myeng pa ga nAn myed pas/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin gis rgyan nyid myed pa ste/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi mngon nyid myed
349a2(mdo): pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid myed pa'o// bdag ni thabs mkhas pa la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang thabs mkhas/ pa la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byind pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ nade la thabs mkhas pa ni chos
349a3(mdo): thams cad yang dag par spyad pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byind pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su skyong bar 'gyur pa'o// 'dzom dpal gzhan yaMng dbugs
349a4(mdo): 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga drag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag ni bsod nams kyi tshogs myi zad pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi
349a5(mdo): zad pa la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la bsod nams kyi tshogs myi zad pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa pa byang chub sdos pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ye shes kyi tshogs la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang 'ashes kyi chogs
349a6(mdo): la 'god do zhes/ dbugs 'byind pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la ye shes kyi tshogs ni stong pa nyid la mos pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba las byung ba'i las la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang shes rab kyi bya ba las
349b1(mdo): byung ba'i las la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byind pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la shes rab kyi rtsa ba las byung ba'i las ni/ bdag nyid chos dkar po la gnas pa gang yin pa'o// yang shes rab kyi rtsa ga las khyab pa'i laso+o ni/ gzhani shes
349b2(mdo): rab la 'god pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni ting nge 'dzind la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang ting nge 'dzind la 'god do zhes du thugs 'byinang pa rnyed par 'byu b+hi !/ de la ting nge 'dzin de ni sems myed pa'i snyoms mar 'jug pa gang yin pa'o/ 
349b3(mdo): bdag ni sa so yang dag par rtogs pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang so so yang dag par rtog pa/ ma 'god do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de so sa so yang+tha dag par rtog pa ni las bya ba NAM 'jug pa ga pa yin pa ste/ 'jam
349b4(mdo): dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpal na mas kyi sa dpa po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs/ 'byi la rnyeng pa lnga dag/ byang chub sems dpan+d+ha rnams kyis
349b5(mdo): dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag ni dbul ma'i lam shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang dbula'i lam shes pa la med do zhes dbu gas 'byind pa rnyed par 'gyur te
349b6(mdo): de la dbu ma'i lam ni mtha' rnam par dag pa shes pa gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha'i rang bzhin las dbu'am nI lam gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/ mtha'i rang bzhin las dI bA ma'i lam gzhan myed pas/ mtha'i rang bzhin
349b7(mdo): nyid dbul ma'i lam mo// bdag ni chos thams cad rtag pa'o zhes bya ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos thams nid rtag pa'o zhes bya ba la 'god do zhes dbugs 'byin pa ne T+TAT+Ti 'gyur te/ de ma chos thams ca pa rtag go nI mthun
349b8(mdo): dang dbud myed pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad mtha' dang dpung myed pa ni/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las/ mtha'u dang dbung myed pa gzhan myed pas/ 'dus byas kyi
350a1(mdo): rang bzhin nyid mtha' dang dbung myed pa'o// mtha' dang dbung myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rtag pa brtan pa/ tsher zug pa'o// bdag ni stongs rgyas la mchod pa bye brag tu ngon par 'phags pa la gnas kyisagazhan dag

350a3(mdo): dpal la la bsnyen cing / bsten pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed cing rnyed pa dang / bkur sti byas te ci nus kyis theg pa chen m+b+hi yang dag par skyed cing sbyin pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni tshe ste thams cad 'dus ma byas so zhes bya la gnas

350a6(mdo): rang bzhin 'dus ma byas shes pa des/ chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'o// bdag ni chos thams cad stong po zhes bya stso la zhugs kyis gzhan dag skam tshos thams cad stong ngo zhes bya ba la 'dzud do zhes dbugs
350a7(mdo): 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la stong pa nyid ni lta bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o// de ci'i rgyur zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin la kyi gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang nyi zhir las stong pa nyid la

352a1(mdo): byed kyi zas pa za nga panas yang gnag ma sa sanang kyis mang kyis pa 'grub bathog sa pabyed pa sgrib 'byed pa/ gyi bye namag pa'i 'ams rgyas par ni bangs khyi ma'i mam mdum da mI byin

352a7(mdo): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu gzigs pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams rab 'byam thams cad na/ sems kyi m+ba 'gro ga/ dang / skye ba dngon du bi la 'gror 'gro b+ha~M dang / rten 'gro ma 'asgo ba rnams
352b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/ de bzhin du gtsug tor gis kyang gzigs so// de bzhin tu mdzod spus kyang gzigs so// de bzhin gyi mtshan gyi sa rgyas ky-iTI kaMs phyi bzhin du dpe' byang bzang po re res kyang gzigs sron
352b2(mdo): de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re res kyang gzigs so// de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rte nang gi khams rab 'byam thams cad na haM/ sems can 'chil 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba dpe/ ngan 'gror 'gro blo dag duste kyi gle tu
352b3(mdo): gzigs so// 'jam dpal gzhin ya gshegs pa'i kun tu gzigs pa mdor bshad pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskas par byin gis kharla byas kyang bstand par myi nus po/ 'jam dpra la ro la de bzhin gagoms pa'i

352b5(mdo): thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams rgya mtsho dag 'jug cing / sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la / 'jig rten dkyi khams re re dang/ gling re reb 'jig rtend kyi khams thams na nga rgya
352b6(mdo): rdul snyed kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thogs pa myed pa sgrib pa myed pa/ dbyer myed pa nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa thams cad 'byung ste/ sems can stongs su smin bur bya ba'i phyir/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i skal par byin gis
352b7(mdo): rlob ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du zhing rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos rnam par 'phrul ba dang / sku rnam par 'phrul pa dang / smon lam rnam par hU~M tshul pa dang / spyod yul rnam khyer 'phrul po dang
353a1(mdo): thul pa thogs pa myed pa/ smis pa myed pa/ dbyer myed pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa dag sems skad cig skad cig/ la~M byung ste/ sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i sku

353b1(mdo): ci 'dra'i mtha' ni yod srid kyi dus gsum gi phyogs mtha' yas pa dag na rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'byung ba dang / 'jig par sngal ba'i rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi mtha'i phyogs rnamasA rI myi rnyed dro de dag ni nam m+b+ha khal rtsi 'adz+ra m+b+hi mdzag ni

354b1(mdo): gshegs pa'i lce gtsug ltar myi mthong ba ni/ 'jam dpal 'jig rtenang gi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams t+yaM mtshol rag naH/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul yod pa dag ni rab tu nyung gi/ du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chubri sems
354b2(mdo): dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la dag ni ches mang ngo // de la byang chub sems dpal kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad tsam mo// byang rgyab sems dpal kha cig gi tshad ni dpag ched bcu dang / ny+tsi shu dang / su ma bcu dang / bzhi bcu
354b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpal kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad brgya'o// byang chub sems dpal kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad brgya phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu pa'o// mkhor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khyun ni
354b4(mdo): dpas chang stong po// 'khor de nyid ma bya chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun mi dpag tshad stong zag bcu dang / nyi gu dang / sum thucu dang / bzhi bcu dang lnga bcu 'jo/ byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag chang bye
354b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi ban+da dang / lnga bcu'o// / bya chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun mi dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya'o/ bya
354b6(mdo): rgyab sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag stong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun mi dpag tshad bye ba stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum brgya dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu yod de/ de dag thams cad kyis
354b7(mdo): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rte nang gi khams rab 'byam thams cad na/ gling thams cad na chus cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyis 'gyur rgya mthong ngo // 'jam dpag gal te/ byang rgyabya sems/ dpal rnam pa mtha rang ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa la gnas/ 
354b8(mdo): pa gang la la zhig sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/ 'jig rten gi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi gom pa 'dor pas/ steng gi phyogs logs su so ste/ gom pa re res kyang 'jig rten gi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten
355a1(mdo): gi khams rgya mtshor song la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug tshol zhing / de bzhin du 'jig rten ki khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi skal pa rgya mtshor song ya / de ma ya de bzhin gshegs pa nyes 'gyur tu mthong ngo // 
355a2(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyi gtsug ltar myi mthong ba mdor bstand pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i skal par byin gis brlabs kyang bstan par myi
355a3(mdo): nus so// 'jam dpal de la bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smyin par mdzad pa/ spyod pa'i gnas rnams ni/ 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenang gi khams rab 'byam nAd kyi rdul snyed kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi
355a4(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams re re dang / gling re re dang / rtul phra rab kyi rdul re de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can yongs su smyind par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams ni ches mang ngo // 'jam dpal 'jig rten gi khams re
355a5(mdo): re dang / kr-i re re dang / rtul phra rab kyi rtul re re la/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can yongs su smin par mchod pa spyod pa'i gnasaji snyed pa de bas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las/ 'od zer rgya mtshor la
355a6(mdo): 'byung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i myod pa rjes su sgrogs pa dag ches mang ngo // sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la de bzhin du gtsug/ tor dang / mdzod spu dang / mtshan re re dang / byad bzang po re me pa
355a7(mdo): u'i khung bu re re nas zhing thams cad kyi rtul snyed kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho dag 'byung ste de la 'od zer rgya mtshol kha cig ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs myed pa rjes su sgrog po da / zer rgya mamo kha cig ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho
355a8(mdo): grangs myed pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od she rgya mtshol kha cig ni pha rol tu phyind pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho tsaka ni rgya mtsho grangs myed pa rjes hrI moM ga / 'od med h+ya ma tsho'u kha cig ni ti da
355b1(mdo): mtsho grangs myed pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni rnam par tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho la kha cig ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho'i glengs myed pa rjes su sles / 
355b2(mdo): zer rgya sto zhwa cig ni mngon par shes pa rgyal tsho grangs myed pa rjes su zlog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni smon lam rgya mtsho'i grangs myed pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtshol kha cig ni brtson 'grus rgya mtsho grangs myed pa rjes su sgo
355b3(mdo): go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho la kha cig ni dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga mtsho mangs myed pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho'i kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa rtul 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs myed la rjes su sgrog go/ du d+yo rgyu ma N+Di la gyig
355b4(mdo): ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho 'a grangs myed pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho la kha cig ni sems can kI bsam pa dang / myod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa rjes su sgro'o/ go
355b5(mdo): 'od zer rgya mtshol kha cig ni 'jig rtenang gi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho'i grangs myed pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mabyo ga cig ni skal pa la 'dug pa rgya mtshol grangs myed pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od chen
355b6(mdo): rgya mtsho kha cig ni rus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho lha grangs sred pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtsho la kha cig ni dus gsum bsten de pa rgya mtsho la grangs myed pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtshol kha cig ni myi skyo ba'i me ma
355b7(mdo): bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs byed pa rjes su sgrog go// 'od zer rgya mtshol kha cig ni ye shes tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa rjes su sgrog ste/ thogs pa myed pa/ sgrib pa myed pa / dbyer myed pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par
355b8(mdo): 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i skal bar byin gyis rlob po// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su sbyin par mdzad pa/ phyod pa'i gnas rnams mngon bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma
356a1(mdo): mtha'i mu'i skal bar byin gis brlabs kyang bstan par myi nus so// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su sbyin par mdzad pa la myi 'jigs pa ni/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshe g+sam+b+ha pas
356a2(mdo): cig skad cig la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtend kyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na/ zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rgya mtsho la dag tus cig tu rtul cig la/ yongs su sbyin par mdzad do// la sems can rgya mtsho
356a3(mdo): ni bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa/ rgya mtsho la grangs myed pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa/ rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i
356a4(mdo): ye shes kyis yongs su sbyin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni pa ro la tu phyinang pa 'a dad pa/ rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i blo brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su sbyin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha ci
356a5(mdo): nim tha dad pa rgya mtsho' grangs myed pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye zhes kyis yongs su min par mdzad do// sems can su mtshol kha cig ni ga zungs tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i grangs myed pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i maphye
356a6(mdo): kyis/ yongs su sbyin par mdzad do// sems cadan rgya mtsho la kha cig ni ti nge 'dzin pa rang pa/ rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i bye brag bsten pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smyin pa ro mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho la cig ni rnam paN+Da
356a7(mdo): pa rgya mtsho'i glengs myed pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smyin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho la kha cig ni so so yang dag par rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i bye bram bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yodas
356a8(mdo): sbyi par mdzad do// sems cad rgya mtshol kha cog ni mngon par shes pa pa dang pa rgya mamo grangs med pa'i bye bras ba stad pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su sbyin par mdzad do sems can rgya mtshol cig di spyod yi
356b1(mdo): zam byed pa rgya phyogs pan gas nam byas yangs su smin par yang nga sems can rgya mtshol bcig ni 'grus kyis pa dang ma gas songs sbyin yong snang
356b2(mdo): mchol kha cig mi dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa tha dad pa/ rgya mtshor grangs myed pa'i bye brag bstand pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad de ni NAM semahrI mtshol kha ka~M ni bya ba myes/ sems rba pa n-i 'dzag kha kyim rgya grangs
356b3(mdo): myed pa'i labye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su sbyin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho la kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs gsu 'jug pa nA dang ste/ rgya mye wI grangs myed pa'i bye brag kyi ston pa 'i yo sa kyis me su smin
356b4(mdo): mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni sems can gi bsam pa dang gyod pa la gnas pa 'a dad pa/ rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i bye bran ye smos kyis yongs su sbyin par mdzad do// sems can rgya
356b5(mdo): mtsho kha cig ni 'jig rten gi khams la 'jug pa tha dad pa/ rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad de/ sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni skal pa tha dad pa grangs myed pa'i bye brag
356b6(mdo): bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smind par mdzad do// de bzhin du rus gsum la 'dug pa dang / ng+yas gsum bstan pa dang myi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dbyer myed pa 'i ye shes kyis yongs su smyin par mdzad do// de bzhin du sem
356b7(mdo): rnam par sprul pa dang / zhing rnam par sprul pa dang / chos rnam par sprul pa dang / smon lam rnam par sprul pa dang / spyod yul rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ye shes rnam par sprul pa dun+tu/ mngon par shes kyi rnam par sprul b+ha dang
356b8(mdo): rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang / stobs rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rnam par ro la pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs myed pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin du skad cig skad tsig+h+na lce sems can+ta rgya mtsho zhi zhems/ da kyi
357a1(mdo): mas kyi mi gyi mi ma / 'dam ma sa rigs kyi su dam rigs kyi bu mo gangs sa ni gags/ banas pa brgyam tsho gang ga'i drung gi bye ma zhed du 'dis rten ge khams pas tsu rgyan yong kyi se hU~M ni nyin
357a2(mdo): brgya ldan pagyid ba pa ni na shes rnams spyor mi byed pas rigs kyi bu'amajims kyi bu gas zhan gang zhig kyis/ ris pame gron pa gzhanas gyi chen du/ sa pa sunas dang sngon pa tsun pa
357a3(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bslab pa la bslabs pa'o snyam du bsams nas/ nyin cig phan cig byin na/ thaMdi ni re bas/ su~M bsod nams grangs myed par 'du skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ga ma ni
357a4(mdo): shes bskal pa gang ga'i gru gi bye ma snyed cu/ dge bsnyen ston pa kanan la gyi rnyed pa/ dge ba phucukhrims kyis mi dpeldan pa 'jig rten gyi ma sa thams cad kyi rdul seng dag la nyin bzhin lha'i tham sa brgya dngasan
357a5(mdo): pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams byin pa byim pa pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig kyis dge slong rtsig la sbyid rnying/ N+Di byin ma shidi ni ri ba ma nyes bsod nams blangs myeng d+hI nA sgyi ra
357a6(mdo): 'jam pas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gnyis la rig sa skal bar rgya mtsho gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed tu 'jig rten sems pams cad du ma nyin ci gzhi b+ha rdo rjem rung na byin pa dang hU~M bzhin tu
357a7(mdo): pA'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu rmo/ gzhan gang zhig gis/ dad pas rjes su 'brang ba gcig la nyin rteni zin cibyina'adi ni 'i ches/ ma ng+ge'i'aM rnams gra pa myed pa
357b1(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gapal la zhig gis/ bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gi khams rtul snyed kyi dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dag la/ nyin cig bzhin du lha'i rlom ro brgya dpa ldan pa byon pa dang mas

357b8(mdo): pa dpe de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams byin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba cig la nyin cig zan cig byin no/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams grangs myed par

359a8(mdo): bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin cig bzhin bya lce'i zas ngo bo rgya dang ldan pa byo/ 
359b1(mdo): lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhun gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yA ge pa 'drir 'jug pa dang / klog pa 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs myen par skyed mas bzlog ste
359b2(mdo): sti stang ma byas pa'i myi dge ba'i las kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ phyugs kyi shinga? rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / re'i shing rta lu bus 'gro ba dang / glang po che'i shIng rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / zla pA dang nyi ma lta bus la sgyog / ny+dzan thaM
359b3(mdo): 'phrul gis 'gro ba 'ab bzhin te/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bya so ga pa la la zhig gis 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyen kyi nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gis 'gro ba'i bya rgyab sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i A
359b4(mdo): rnams kyi bar chad byas pas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan ga zhig gis de bzhin gshegs de'i rdzu 'phrul gis 'gro pa'i byang rlob sems dpa' cig la tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su garten sa
359b5(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed cing khro ba dang brnyas pa'i/ sems can rnams kyi 'di ni de bas che sa bsod nams ma yin pa grangs myed par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gangal la zhig gis
359b6(mdo): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi myig phyung nas/ bdog pa thams cad rdzogs pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi sku mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i
359b7(mdo): sems bskyed de myos na de myi dge ba'i las des sems can dmyal ba d+ha 'bod chen por lus dpag tshad lnga brgya par skye bar 'gyur te/ de la 'go lnga brgya yod par 'gyur ro// de'i mgo re re la yang+ga ShAM lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par
359b8(mdo): 'gyur te/ de'i kha re re la yang lce lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur te/ lce re me la yang gshol lnga brgya lnga brgyas rmo bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ka dz+rag+h+ra k+Sha/ zhig gis/ A~M piM ga sum go snying chen po'i
360a1(mdo): 'jig rten gi khams rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad/ dbyug pa dang mtshon gis bsrun te/ bdog pa thams cad rnam pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'a rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gi ste/ byang chub
360a2(mdo): sems dpal la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed na/ khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / zab pa dang / khro ba'i sems bskyed na 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa glengs myed pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs gyi bu rdzog pa la
360a3(mdo): zhig gis/ sdang ba'i sems kyis sems can rnams la gnod par 'dod cing / 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ 'jig rten gi khasdus re re dang / gli ster man/ dgra bcom pa gang ga'i rlung gi bye ma
360a4(mdo): snyed dag gi srog bcad pa dang / rin po che'i mchod rtend rin po che'i steg sa bus yongs su bskor cing gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang/ lha'i sa dan btsugs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag pa shig pa 'a
360a5(mdo): 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po nyid la sgro btegs te/ brnyas pa'i sems skyed nas rkyen ci pa
360a6(mdo): rung / khro ba dang / gshe ba dang / myi snyan par zer ba dang / khyad du gsod par byed na 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs myed par skyed de// de ci'i phyir zhe / byang chub sems dpal las/ de bzhin gshegs pa de skad
360a7(mdo): 'byung ba'i phyir te/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa'i yin no// byang chub sems dpal sa skum pa tha/ chos spangs pa yin nom/ chos kyang gzhan khan gyi chos yongs su 'dzind pa'i byang chub sa
360a8(mdo): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid chos so// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gapa la la zhig khros nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten ni khrims thams kyadams su
360b1(mdo): smrag pa pa gas kyi sa gyu gas kyi bu min gyisas kyis/ kyang pa sem sa dpa'al rgyas kyis myogs mi duganas ma khyim pa 'id kyi dim don du zla ni/ nga byed
360b2(mdo): skyed rdo/ 'jim dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gapal la zhig gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas gzhan napa zhig gis bye puN+Da paM yi ma sa dpa
360b3(mdo): papa la smad na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grongs myed par skyed do// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyis 'dri lha ste/ mtho' pa dang / yangs pa dang / che bas ri thams cad zil
360b4(mdo): lham me/ lhan ne/ ltang de'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pas kyang 'di ste stematho ba dang yongs pa dang / che bas phyos
360b5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad la rdul snyed yod pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa sa pha rol tu phyin bu lnga las byung la bskalang pa grangs myed para'
360b6(mdo): zil kyis mnan nas/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lha ba la/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rte nang gi kham sa thams cad kyi sems can rnams cad byang chub sem
360b7(mdo): la bkod pa bas 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ phung po myed pa'i gzhi la bkod na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod rnams grangs myed par sbyang / la ma sa pa gas
360b8(mdo): sems can thams cad phung po myed pa'i gzhi la la mos par gyur pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos la mos nas kya
361a1(mdo): yig pa ma 'jug pa dang / zlog pa dang / srog tu 'dug pa dang / man grag pa bim tu bris pa la mos nas 'dzin par / mar me dang/ me he d+h+ya sa/ gang+yas ma bud sa du pang
361a2(mdo): byag pa rnams kyis mchod par byed na/ 'don de bas nyis bsod nams grangs byed par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi mu mo gdas la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtedang mi ma sa ga mthar rgyu
361a3(mdo): gtogs pa'i sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa re re dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhal tu myed pa/ grangs myed pa rnams dpa'akhor khos sgyur ba'i rgyal 'a/ 
361a4(mdo): 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / lha'i 'jig rtend du skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rgyad gsan pa bas te/ gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig chud zos par byas na/ 'di ni de bas ches yig
361a5(mdo): grangs myed par skyed na/ gshel ba dang myi snyan par smra pa lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gisamacho rten grang ga'i klung gis bye ma snyed dag na/ ni pa
361a6(mdo): dang / bsregs pa pas/ rigs kyi bu ma/ rigs kyi bu mo gang naM ka zhig/ gis theg pa chen po mos pa'i byang chub sems dkyi' la/ gnodasems 'a 'thab po dang / 'khro ba'i sngo ske par
361a7(mdo): gi shi spyad pa/ myi snyan par smra pa na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs myed par bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dres rnams nges par byu ba la gyur
361a8(mdo): rten rnams byung zhing nga sangs rgyas las 'jig rten thams cad dpa/ lha'i ris thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad las byu ba la/ sangs rgyas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i las byu bstan te/ byang
361b1(mdo): sdang ma byas pA nI y-i sangs rgyas thams cad la sti stang ma byas pa yin no// byang rgyap+na sems dpa' la sti stang byas pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad la sti steng byas po yin no// sangs rgyas thams nyimAM bla na myed pas
361b2(mdo): mcho byed 'dod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod par bya'o// 'jam dpal gal te/ grong khyer la la zhig na/ byang chub semasnad pa'i bye ba/ rgya 'am/ bye ba stong pa/ bye ba ba h+ya ste par mi rgya skyed
361b3(mdo): pa/ grangs myed pa dag yod la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma mos na/ de dgani las kyi rgyal pos 'khrugs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rgyas 'khrugs par 'gyur bu'i yis sam te/ chom rkun kis 'khrugs pas byar+ya ASh+Ti sa
361b4(mdo): sam/ mes 'khrugs par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ kla glos 'khrugs pa/ ra 'gyur ba'i las su 'gyur ro// grong khyer chen po de dag ni chosakyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa ma stong
361b5(mdo): de'i las ni bskal pa grangs myed par 'tshams myed pa'i gnas su skye bar myi 'gyu ra/ grong khyer deng skye bar myi 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub sems dpal de dag gi las rgyal pos 'khrug par myi 'byung / 
361b6(mdo): rgyas 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i sas kyi 'gyur/ sa rgya kyis 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i mas kyi 'byung / rtse gas 'khrus par 'gyur ba'i las kyi 'byu skyes 'azhug par 'gyur ba'i las kyi 'byung / blo gros ma khrus
361b7(mdo): las kyi 'byung la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i las rgya mtsho la grangs myed par sems can dmyal ba dang / hud 'gro dang / yi dgas su skye bar 'gyur ba yod na rapa la rtag pa 'gyur
361b8(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i las bskal pa grangs myed pa brjod du myed par mtshams myed par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i las bskal pa bcu dang nyi shu dang / sum bcur ngan so myed par 'gyur ba yang tshe 'di la myong ste
362a1(mdo): 'azhug pas byang bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams chen po'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lnga ste// dper na rgya med pakra Ni rtswa ba rgya'i rdzi pa yan yas brgyad pu dang wA du
362a2(mdo): pa'i rgyas gang ba/ la dug srang stong yang myi gdug par 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu'i phung po chen pos rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin du skal pa grangs myed par / sems can du myal la dpe 'dra drud 'gro dang / yi rigs kyi nang du gnas
362a3(mdo): par 'gyur ba'i las rab tu mang ba ya ba rnam par smyinang par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams kyi chogs chen po bas gsags pa'i phyir ngos / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas ny-i dge slong de dag dang
362a4(mdo): byang chub sems dpal phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa dpag tu myed paHgrangs myed pa rnams dang / lha dang / gyi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid tshangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon pa ma
362a5(mdo): stong ngo do// 'phags pa dang pa'i stobs skyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// / rgya kar smi mkhan po mu khyen tu byo t+ye dang/ zhu chen gi lo tsa pa ban te ye shes
362a6(mdo): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la yab pa// // rgya kar skad du// at+ya ni ya ta ma ya ta ka ti mu 'dra a ba ta ra na mam tshA yA nu suM trabod skad du mau 'a bugs pa nges pa dang mdzes
362a7(mdo): phyag kyis hU~M ga~M spyi zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i byas ci kre nAt+ta/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po kha bA na/ bya rgod phywa/ bre'i / 
362a8(mdo): slong skye nyes brgya lnga brgya dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpal bye ba khrig khrig 'bum phrag drug rtsal 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da Na rapra spyan ris gzigs dbang phyu na dzi sa
